oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Robert Edward Little and wife Rachel Matilda Blackwell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Robert Edmond Little, Co. E, 5th Ala. Cav. Regt., CSA was from Franklin County, Alabama and was thirty-five years old at the time of his enlistment in September 1862. He was captured in Franklin County, Alabama in March 1865 and remained at Camp Chase, Ohio until taking the oath of allegiance on May 16, 1865. The 5th Ala. Cav. Regt., CSA was part of the command of Phillip Dale Roddey which spent most of the war in north Alabama or southern Middle Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Little, Robert Edward; Blackwell, Rachel Matilda
